Oh....er. Oprah is starting again.
So where do your get the ideas for all you songs?

title.en: What can I do in here?

dia.en: What can I do in here?
You need to get some insight in to someone on the other side of one of these doors

title.en: How do I listen to people?

dia.en: How do I listen to people?
You need a listening device
Tell me what to do!
Use the stethoscope on the guards door.
You may need to do it multiple times

title.en: Do I need to find something here?

dia.en: Do I need to find something here?
Yes. You need to find something out here.

title.en: What do I need to find out?

dia.en: What do I need to find out?
You need to remember one of your work colleague's names

title.en: How do I remember their name?

dia.en: How do I remember their name?
Look at all the photos on the walls
No More Help Please

title.en: Do I need to do anything in this room?

dia.en: Do I need to do anything in this room?
Yes
What can I do here?
You have a new key card
Maybe that one works on more doors?
